channel.title: [PI] Help! Making gates open and close
channel.description: I'm making a remake and you know theres too much of them and their gonna fail and such bla bla bla, but can you tell me how to make the gates work? I tried everything I put them in doubledoors.cfg i tried doors.cfg nothing works... PLEASE HELP!

item.title: [PI] Help! Making gates open and close
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

doors.cfg and doubledoors.cfg doesn’t work. You have to delete them, and respawn them via ActionHandler using the Object constructor.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help! Making gates open and close
